title: Jeff Goldblum ‘Stopped Eating Meat’ After Grappling with Themes of Animal Cruelty in ‘Wicked: For Good’: ‘It’s Changed Me’
summary: Jeff Goldblum says he’s gone vegetarian after playing the Wizard of Oz in Jon M. Chu’s blockbuster sequel “Wicked: For Good.” During a recent interview on “This Morning,” Goldblum discussed how lucky he feels to play such an impactful role as the Wizard at age 73. He also added that, because of the…

title: Chinese camera company gives out gold keycaps worth up to $45,000 to top employees — more than 50 prizes given out by Insta360
summary: Webcam brand Insta360 has gifted real gold keycaps, worth up to $45,000 each, to its most valued employees.
